net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_CharSheet_Util_getResourceInput
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
<html><pre>arg (0) = (Optional) Resource to return an input string for. If noe is provided, an input string for each resource is returned.
Returns: a JSON object including the inputString and field names including a special "NEW_RESOURCE" field. If the stringProperty for the "NEW_RESOURCE" variable has a name property of "NEW_RESOURCE", the caller must assume a new resource was NOT defined and ignore "NEW_RESOURCE".
Input String fields, per tab: name: Name of the resource limit: Maximum uses of the counter current: Current uses of the counter resets: "Short", "Long", or "Special", indicating the circumstances a resource is reset to full delete: Boolean 1 or 0, indicating the resource is to be removed (1) or retained (0)
